statements: SELECT * FROM films;
SELECT film_name, genre, rating FROM films;
SELECT film_id, film_name FROM films WHERE genre='Action';
SELECT * FROM films ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT film_id, film_name, genre, rating FROM films WHERE rating > 8.0;
SELECT * FROM films WHERE genre = 'Action' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT film_name, genre FROM films WHERE rating > 8.0;
SELECT film_name, genre, rating FROM films WHERE genre = 'Comedy' ORDER BY film_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_films FROM films;
SELECT film_name, genre, rating FROM films WHERE rating BETWEEN 7.0 AND 9.0 ORDER BY genre ASC, film_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM films;
SELECT title, genre FROM films WHERE genre = 'Action';
SELECT title, rating FROM films WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT film_id, title, genre FROM films ORDER BY genre DESC;
SELECT film_id, title, genre, rating FROM films WHERE genre = 'Comedy' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM films WHERE genre = 'Action' ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT title, rating FROM films WHERE rating >= 7.5;
SELECT film_id, title, genre, rating FROM films WHERE genre = 'Comedy' AND rating < 6.0 ORDER BY film_id;
SELECT films.title, film_ratings.rating FROM films JOIN film_ratings ON films.film_id = film_ratings.film_id WHERE film_ratings.user_id = 123;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating, COUNT(*) AS num_films FROM films;
SELECT * FROM films;
SELECT title, genre FROM films WHERE rating > 7.0;
SELECT title, rating FROM films ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT film_id, genre_name FROM films JOIN genres ON films.genre = genres.genre_id;
SELECT * FROM films WHERE genre='Action';
SELECT title, rating FROM films WHERE genre = 'Action' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM films JOIN genres ON films.genre = genres.genre_name WHERE genres.genre_name = 'Drama';
SELECT film_id, genre_name FROM films JOIN genres ON genres.genre_id = film_genres.genre_id WHERE films.genre = 'Comedy';
SELECT title, rating FROM films WHERE genre IN ('Action', 'Comedy') AND rating > 7;

SELECT genre_name, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM genres JOIN film_genres ON genres.genre_id = film_genres.genre_id JOIN films ON film_genres.film_id = films.film_id GROUP BY genre_name HAVING AVG(rating) > 6;
SELECT * FROM films
SELECT title, genre FROM films
SELECT title, rating FROM films WHERE genre='Action'
SELECT film_id, title, genre FROM films ORDER BY title DESC
SELECT genre_name, COUNT(*) FROM genres INNER JOIN film_genres ON genres.genre_id = film_genres.genre_id GROUP BY genre_name
SELECT title, genre, rating FROM films WHERE genre='Action';
SELECT title FROM films WHERE rating > 8.0 ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT genre_name, AVG(rating_value) AS avg_rating FROM genres JOIN film_genres ON genres.genre_id = film_genres.genre_id JOIN ratings ON film_genres.film_id = ratings.film_id GROUP BY genre_name;

SELECT film_id, film.title, genres.genre_name, ratings.rating_value FROM films JOIN genres ON films.genre = genres.genre_name JOIN ratings ON films.film_id = ratings.film_id WHERE ratings.rating_value < 6.0 ORDER BY ratings.rating_value DESC;
SELECT films.title, genres.genre_name FROM films, genres WHERE films.genre = genres.genre_name AND films.rating > 7.0 ORDER BY genres.genre_name ASC, films.title DESC;
SELECT film_id, title, genre, rating FROM films WHERE genre = 'Action';
SELECT name, birth_date, gender FROM actors WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT film_id, actor_id, character_name FROM film_actors WHERE actor_id = 1;
SELECT genre_id, genre_name FROM genres ORDER BY genre_name ASC;
SELECT film_id, rating FROM ratings WHERE rating >= 8.0;
SELECT title, genre, rating FROM films WHERE rating > 7.5 ORDER BY title ASC
SELECT name, birth_date, gender FROM actors WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY name DESC
